Grouped_Utterances: I’d like to try going to a larger event next. Maybe a local festival or something. I’ve been having some really vivid nightmares lately. They’ve been distressing.
Yes, I feel a bit more in control of my anxiety. It’s still there, but I feel like I can manage it better. They seem to happen more when I’m stressed or haven’t slept well.

It felt empowering. I was able to calm myself down a bit and keep going. I felt proud of myself for going and for managing my anxiety. No, I think that’s it for now. I feel a bit lighter after talking.
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been okay. I did manage to go for a few walks since we last spoke.

One technique is to create a “dream journal.” Before bed, write down any worries or thoughts that are on your mind. This can help release some of that tension. You can also practice visualization techniques before sleep. Imagine a peaceful scene or a safe place that brings you comfort.
